title: Recommender - Find recommendations in the Recommendation Hub
abstract:
# Recommender - Find recommendations in the Recommendation Hub
# Find recommendations in the Recommendation Hub
**    Preview    — Recommendation Hub ** This feature is subject to the "Pre-GA Offerings Terms" in the General Service Terms section   of the [Service Specific Terms](/terms/service-terms#1) .     Pre-GA features are available "as is" and might have limited support.    For more information, see the [launch stage descriptions](/products#product-launch-stages) .
content:
## Before you begin
Ensure that you have the [necessary roles and permissions](/recommender/docs/recommendation-hub/find-recommnedation-hub#before_you_begin) to view recommendations.
## Find recommendations
You can find your recommendations from the Recommendation Hub
Navigate to the Recommendation Hub. To learn more about what's on this page, see [Dashboard overview](/recommender/docs/recommendation-hub/dashboard-overview) .
[Go to Recommendation Hub](https://console.cloud.google.com/home/recommendations)
- To view all of your recommendations, click **All recommendations** from the left-hand navigation.
- To view recommendations for a specific value pillar, click the respective pillar from the left-hand navigation, or select the category from the All recommendations card to go to its recommendation page. 
You should now see a table displaying your recommendations similar to the following screenshot:
You can also adjust the recommendations the table displays by applying filters. You can apply multiple filters by selecting existing options or by creating your own using even partial strings.
## What's next
- [Share recommendations](/recommender/docs/recommendation-hub/share-recommendations) 
- [Apply or dismiss recommendations](/recommender/docs/recommendation-hub/changing-applying-recommendations)
